sentences.en: ...the landlocked West African nation of Mali.
A landlocked country of central Europe.
A narrow suspension bridge point for the main trade route linking landlocked Zimbabwe, Malawi and Zambia.
sentences.cn: 城中一座狭窄的吊桥是连接内陆国津巴布韦 、 马拉维与赞比亚的贸易主干线.

sentences.en: Austria is a landlocked country of central Europe.
sentences.cn: 奥地利是欧洲中部的内陆国。

sentences.en: Crustal movements closed the straits, and the landlocked Mediterranean began to evaporate.
sentences.cn: 地壳运动封闭了海峡, 被陆地包围的地中海也开始蒸发.

sentences.en: Landlocked Uganda and Rwanda are being hurt.
sentences.cn: 内陆的乌干达和卢旺达都被这个所伤害.

sentences.en: The landlocked region had reported 199.2 of explored coal as of last year.
sentences.cn: 截止到去年为止,陆地探明储量为1992亿吨.

sentences.en: The ship cemetry 64 km from the landlocked port of Aralsk.
sentences.cn: 船只停靠在距离阿拉斯克港64公里的地方.

words.tran_cn: 土地所有的；占用土地的
着陆；[水运] 初见陆地；到达陆地

trans.tran_en: a landlocked country, state etc is surrounded by other countries, states etc and has no coast
